fields.name: identifier
fields.description: Identifier(s) from manufacturer, owner and others.

fields.name: identifier.type
fields.description: The type for the identifier that can be used to determine which identifier to use for a specific purpose.

binding.description: The type used to determine which identifier to use for a specific purpose.
binding.note: Currently will return SNO code from the below system.
Currently not bound to any terminology and only 'Device.type.text' will be returned as of now.
